message.body: Hey jeremy,this may be uneccasary but i caught the caution on your face,hope you have a good event, i partialy sleep deprived and hung over please humor my sensitivity please. I got a text from erik saying how cool it was to run into you and i feel a weird and intense energy from him that doesnt agree with me,and i believe you guys prob picked up on it too. I try to make friends with most people and feel somewhat repelled by him and doesn't help that he may have a crush on me somewhat... Just hope you don't misplace any wierdness with me :( I don't feel nice expressing that but please humor ,wishing the best, have fun
Haha, i see,people always tell me i "look" high ,,,,interesting :)
You are just too wonderful. Workin late tonight?
Yes,saturday hosts a long day indeed,i just caught a second to relax but we always close at 2 now.thank you,youre a sweetcake!!
